Sept. 26 discussion with “Translations” director and Paul Muldoon at Princeton Public Library

Posted on September 21, 2006July 8, 2014 by Players & Painted Stage

Join director Garry Hynes and poet Paul Muldoon in a discussion on McCarter’s production of Translations, Brian Friel’s timeless masterpiece of Irish history, community, colonialism, identity and language. This production is in conjunction with Princeton University’s Irish Theatre Festival.

McCarter Live at the Library: Translations
Princeton Public Library
65 Witherspoon Street
Tuesday, September 26, 2006
7:30-9:00 p.m.

http://www.princeton.lib.nj.us/events/
